room_title: Escape room "Escape Room Academy" by Arkansas Escape Rooms in Little Rock
room_address: 2615 North Prickett Road, Suite 4 Bryant, AR 72022
room_description: You are trapped in the Escape Room Academy and only have one hour to find the 8-digit code to escape. The Escape Room Academy puzzles focus on all the things you would expect to find in school (Math, Geography, Science) plus lots of puzzles and riddles. Will you be able to escape detention?
